sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-app-bar app>
    <v-container>
      <v-row align="center">
        <v-col cols="3">
          <v-toolbar-title>
            <v-btn icon v-bind="attrs" v-on="on">
              üîî
              <v-badge color="red" :content="notifications.length" overlap></v-badge>
            </v-btn>
          
          </v-toolbar-title>
        </v-col>
        <v-col cols="6">
          <v-row justify="center">
            <v-btn text @click="navigate('Í∞ïÏ¢å')">Í∞ïÏ¢å</v-btn>
            <v-btn text @click="navigate('Ï∂îÏ≤ú')">Ï∂îÏ≤ú</v-btn>
            <v-btn text @click="navigate('Ïù¥Î≤§Ìä∏')">Ïù¥Î≤§Ìä∏</v-btn>
            <v-btn text @click="navigate('Í≥µÏßÄÏÇ¨Ìï≠')">Í≥µÏßÄÏÇ¨Ìï≠</v-btn>
            <v-btn text @click="navigate('ÏûêÏú†Í≤åÏãúÌåê')">ÏûêÏú†Í≤åÏãúÌåê</v-btn>
            <v-btn text @click="navigate('QnA')">ÏßàÎ¨∏Í≤åÏãúÌåê</v-btn>
          </v-row>
        </v-col>
        <v-col cols="3" class="text-right">
          <v-btn icon @click="goToMember">
            <v-icon>mdi-account</v-icon>
          </v-btn>
          <v-btn v-if="isLogin" @click="doLogout">Î°úÍ∑∏ÏïÑÏõÉ</v-btn>
          <v-btn icon @click="goToMenu">
            <v-icon>mdi-menu</v-icon>
          </v-btn>
        </v-col>
      </v-row>
    </v-container>

    <!-- ÏïåÎ¶º ÏïÑÏù¥ÏΩò Î∞è ÏïåÎ¶º Î™©Î°ù -->
    <v-menu v-if="notifications.length > 0" offset-y>
      <template v-slot:activator="{ on, attrs }">
        <v-btn icon v-bind="attrs" v-on="on">
          <v-icon>mdi-bell"></v-icon>
          <v-badge color="red" :content="notifications.length" overlap></v-badge>
        </v-btn>
      </template>
      <v-list>
        <v-list-item v-for="(notification, index) in notifications" :key="index">
          <v-list-item-content>
            <v-list-item-title>{{ notification.message }}</v-list-item-title>
          </v-list-item-content>
        </v-list-item>
      </v-list>
    </v-menu>
  </v-app-bar>
</template>

<script>
import { EventSourcePolyfill } from 'event-source-polyfill';

export default {
  name: 'HeaderComponent',
  data() {
    return {
      logo: require('@/assets/images/ico_logo.png'),
      isLogin: false,
      notifications: [],
    };
  },
  mounted() {
    const token = localStorage.getItem('token');
    this.isLogin = !!token;

    if (this.isLogin) {
      // EventSourcePolyfillÏùÑ ÏÇ¨Ïö©ÌïòÏó¨ SSE Ïó∞Í≤∞
      const eventSource = new EventSourcePolyfill(`${process.env.VUE_APP_API_BASE_URL}/subscribe`, {
        headers: {
          Authorization: `Bearer ${token}`
        }
      });

      eventSource.onmessage = (event) => {
        const notification = JSON.parse(event.data);
        this.notifications.push(notification);
        console.log('ÏÉà ÏïåÎ¶º:', notification.message);
      };

      eventSource.onerror = (error) => {
        console.error('SSE Ïó∞Í≤∞ Ïò§Î•ò:', error);
      };
    }
  },
  methods: {
    navigate(section) {
      if (section === 'Í∞ïÏ¢å') {
        this.$router.push({ name: 'SubjectList', params: { category: 'subject' } });
      } else if (section === 'Ïù¥Î≤§Ìä∏') {
        this.$router.push({ name: 'BoardList', params: { category: 'event' } });
      } else if (section === 'Í≥µÏßÄÏÇ¨Ìï≠') {
        this.$router.push({ name: 'BoardList', params: { category: 'notice' } });
      } else if (section === 'ÏûêÏú†Í≤åÏãúÌåê') {
        this.$router.push({ name: 'BoardList', params: { category: 'post' } });
      } else if (section === 'QnA') {
        this.$router.push({ name: 'QnaList', params: { category: 'qna' } });
      } else {
        console.log(section);
      }
    },
    goToMember() {
      if (this.isLogin) {
        this.$router.push('/user/edit-info');
      } else {
        this.$router.push('/login');
      }
    },
    goToMenu() {
      console.log('Go to menu');
    },
    doLogout() {
      localStorage.removeItem('role');
      localStorage.removeItem('token');
      this.isLogin = false;
      console.log('Logged out');
      window.location.reload();
    }
  }
};
</script>

<style scoped>
.logo {
  font-weight: bold;
  color: inherit;
  text-decoration: none;
}

.logo-image {
  height: 10%;
}
</style>
